venue.address_2: Actual address is 550 but wrong on Google
venue.name: Seacoast Family YMCA

item.description:
Turner Wilson and Cheri Perry of Kayak Ways are offering kayak rolling instruction from 3pm- to 6pm. While we specialize in Greenlandic Instruction, we can work with any blade.  This session is ideal for all skill sets from beginning to advanced.  We do a short demo and then work in a one to one format. We will try to provide a low volume kayak for new rollers and a tuiliq and greenland blade for those who need one.  We will take 2 students per 45 min session.  We suggest you arrive at 3pm to watch the demo and you can practice or assist until your time slot.  We will take a max of 6 students this session.  A follow up email will be sent asking your preference for the following time slots.   3:15, 4pm, 4:45.

Please mail a check to 

Kayak Ways LLC

PO Box 122

Brownfield ME 04010

In addition to the lesson fee you will need to also pay Neil Sheehan $25 for the pool fee.  You can mail a separate check to Neil at

Neil Sheehan

763 Ocean Boulevard
Hampton, NH 03842
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the pool, you have to go thru the main entrance to get yourself to the pool, leave kayaks by gate
item.name: Rolling Instruction in Portsmouth, NH
